H0.text: distance from one side of a bridge to the other crossword. Width

H2.text: distance from one side of a bridge to the other crossword. Breadth

H3.text: distance from one side of a bridge to the other crossword. span

A4.text: span is the distance between two adjacent structural supports (e.g., two piers) of a structural member (e.g., a beam).

A5.text: For a bridge, the total span is the distance between the faces of the abutments:
